Title: The Rainbow Kid
Writer: Noel S. Baker (story editor), John Frizzell (story editor), Kire Paputts
Actors: Julian Richings, Nicholas Campbell, Krystal Hope Nausbaum, Tony Nappo
Plot: Eugene, a young man with Down Syndrome, embarks on the journey of a lifetime: he's going to find the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow and save the day.
